message.raw:
transition_to_buffered:
* Define exposures attribute to be used by transition_to_static when saving
  images by name.
* Use labscript_utils to get device_properties.
* Attempt to get stop time of experiment by walking the device heirarchy, to
  inform acquisition timeout.
* Set exposure time and acquisition timeout explicitly, and any IMAQdx
  properties specified in added_properties.
* Get exposure_time, width, height (mandatory) and binning and pixel format
  (optional) to write as per-shot attributes in transition_to_static.
message.html:

(optional) to write as per-shot attributes in transition_to_static.
